info.description:
Testing Swagger spec. It's still in progress

The API returns incorrect response codes and has bugs, however,
The essential CRUD operations are fully functional
info.title: Golang OGREE API

post.description:
Create an account with Email credentials, it returns
a JWT key to use with the API. The
authorize and 'Try it out' buttons don't work

get.summary: Gets All Buildings in the system.

post.summary: Creates a Building in the system.

parameters.description: ParentID of Building refers to Site
parameters.name: ParentID

parameters.description: Category of Building (ex. Consumer Electronics, Medical)
parameters.name: Category

parameters.description: Indicates the position in a XY coordinate format
parameters.name: PosXY

parameters.description: Indicates the unit of the PosXY position. Only values of "mm", "cm", "m", "U", "OU", "tile" are acceptable
parameters.name: PosXYU

parameters.description: Indicates the position in the Z axis
parameters.name: PosZ

parameters.description: Indicates the unit of the Z coordinate position. Only values of "mm", "cm", "m", "U", "OU", "tile" are acceptable
parameters.name: PosZU

parameters.description: Size of Building in an XY coordinate format
parameters.name: Size

parameters.description: The unit for Building Size. Only values of "mm", "cm", "m", "U", "OU", "tile" are acceptable
parameters.name: SizeU

parameters.description: The unit for Building Height. Only values of "mm", "cm", "m", "U", "OU", "tile" are acceptable
parameters.name: HeightU

get.summary: Gets Building hierarchy using Building ID.
Gets all Racks of Building.
Gets Rooms of Building.
Gets a Room of Building.
Gets Racks of named Room of Building.
Gets a Rack of Building.
Gets a Devices of Building.
Gets a Devices of Building.

get.description:
Gets a Building using any attribute (with the exception of description) via query
The attributes are in the form {attr}=xyz&{attr1}=abc
And any combination can be provided given that at least 1 is provided.

parameters.name: Category

parameters.description: Indicates the position in a XY coordinate format

parameters.description: Indicates the unit of the PosXY position. Only values of "mm", "cm", "m", "U", "OU", "tile" are acceptable
parameters.name: PosXYU

parameters.description: Indicates the position in the Z axis

parameters.description: Size of Building in an XY coordinate format

parameters.name: SizeU

parameters.description: The unit for Building Height. Only values of "mm", "cm", "m", "U", "OU", "tile" are acceptable
parameters.name: HeightU

The attributes are in the form {attr}=xyz&{attr1}=abc
And any combination can be provided given that at least 1 is provided.
